name: Introduction to Biology
description: This course provides a basic introduction to the principles of biology.

name: Introduction to Biotechnology
description: This course provides a basic introduction to the principles of biotechnology and its applications.

name: Cell Biology
description: This course covers the structure and function of cells and their relationship to the larger organism.

name: Genetics and Molecular Biology
description: This course covers the structure and function of genes and their relationship to the larger organism.

name: Immunology
description: This course covers the structure and function of the immune system and its relationship to the larger organism.

name: Microbiology
description: This course covers the structure and function of microorganisms and their relationship to the larger organism.

name: Biochemistry
description: This course covers the structure and function of biochemical molecules and their relationship to the larger organism.

name: Advanced Biotechnology
description: This course covers the advanced applications of biotechnology.
